executable.title: TIFF to UML
executable.description: Analyze a TIFF and ouput am SVG UML diagram of its structure.

image.name: inputImageFile
image.label: Input Image
image.description: Input image in which to count and classify positive pixels

file.name: outputSVGFile
file.label: SVG Output File
file.description: An SVG representation of the file structure (*.svg)

boolean.name: thumb
boolean.label: Output Thumbnail
boolean.description: If true, outpute a thumbnail of each ifd.

boolean.name: structure
boolean.label: Output Structure
boolean.description: If true, ouput a thumbnail of each ifd showing the tile or strip structure of the image.

boolean.name: order
boolean.label: Output Order
boolean.description: If true, output a thumbnail of each ifd showing the order of the tiles or strips in the image. Missing tiles and strips are shown in yellow. Otherwise, the order is earlier parts are black and later parts are white.

integer.name: minthumb
integer.label: Minimum Thumbnail Size
integer.description: Thumbnails are adjusted in size based on the size of the input images. The smallest will map to this size.

integer.name: maxthumb
integer.label: Maximum Thumbnail Size
integer.description: Thumbnails are adjusted in size based on the size of the input images. The largest will map to this size.
